FuncDef:
The ipv4 source address command specifies a source address and MTU for an open system.
The undo ipv4 source address command cancels the configuration. The ipv4 source address command specifies a source address and MTU for an open system. The undo ipv4 source address command cancels the configuration. By default, no open source address is specified. If only the source address is configured, the default MTU is 1500.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the MTU used by an open system for external communication.
The value is an integer ranging from 68 to 9600.

Specifies the source address for openness.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
